T02D1278:130a-0: @130a * // chos spyod mdor bsdus pa'i bya ba bzhugs so //
T02D1278:130a-2: # // dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1278:130a-3: 'di'i lam du 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas dang por
T02D1278:130a-4: lhan cig skyes pa'i bde pa'i dang du nyal nas
T02D1278:130a-5: / nang par tho rangs khar tshad med pa'i lha
T02D1278:130a-6: mo bzhis tshad med pa'i glus bskul nas langs te
T02D1278:130b-0: khrus byas nas nang du @130b gnas te /
T02D1278:130b-1: bdud rtsi dang pa'i rnam lngas sems dang bas mandala legs par byas te byug pa bya zhing /
T02D1278:130b-2: ngag tu badzra re khe h'um zhes byas pas sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D1278:130b-3: de nas me tog gcig mandala gyi dbus su gzhag
T02D1278:130b-4: / srung ba'i phur bu stod khro bo smad phur
T02D1278:130b-5: pa gcig tu bsams la bsrung ngo //
T02D1278:130b-6: me tog gcig rang gi mgor bzhag nas lus bsrungs pa dang de nas lag pa bkrus nas /
T02D1278:130b-7: aom de ba pe tsu badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a //
T02D1278:130b-8: zhes pas me tog gcig dbus su bzhag pas gtso bo yab yum du bskyed /
T02D1278:130b-9: shar du go bo r'i na ma: zhes pas me
T02D1278:130b-10: tog gcig gzhag / de bzhin du lho dang nub
T02D1278:130b-11: dang byang dang shar lho lho nub nub byang dang
T02D1278:130b-12: byang shar mtshams su rim pa bzhin du /
T02D1278:130b-15: ghasma r'i na ma: pukka s'i na ma:/
T02D1278:130b-18: do mbi n'i na ma:/ zhes pas me tog dgram pa dang /
T02D1278:130b-19: der lha mo re re mos pa tsam gyis bskyed de /
T02D1278:130b-20: mchod pa rim pa bzhin du bshams nas /
T02D1278:130b-21: bris sku la sogs pa legs par bkram nas /
T02D1278:130b-22: stan bde ba la sogs par 'dug ste /
T02D1278:130b-23: rang nyid mos pa'i lhar bsams pa'i snying gar /
T02D1278:130b-24: pam las padma dang ram las nyi ma'i steng du h'um sngon po bsams la /
T02D1278:130b-25: lus kyis rdo rje dril bu gzung /
T02D1278:130b-26: ngag tu aom he badzra aa dhi shtha na raksha raksha h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1278:130b-27: zhes brjod pas sems kyis h'um las 'od zer 'phros pas thams cad rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang /
T02D1278:130b-30: gur du bsams la aom he badzra la gong gi sngags raksha la sogs pa sbyar /
T02D1278:130b-31: bsam phas lus thams cad rdo rje'i rnam par bya ba dang /
T02D1278:130b-32: aom badzra badzra la dzi hva la sogs pa sbyor bas ngag rdo rjer bsams pa dang /
T02D1278:130b-33: aom he badzra yo ga raksha raksha h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1278:130b-35: sems rdo rje'i rnam par song bar bsams pa ni sems srung ba'o //
T02D1278:130b-36: de nas mchod pa thams cad la dmigs nas /
T02D1278:130b-37: aom badzra pu shpe a'a: h'um zhes pa la sogs
T02D1278:130b-38: pa gang du brjod cing me tog dang spos dang
T02D1278:130b-39: mar me dang dri chab dang lha bshos rnams so
T02D1278:130b-40: so'i rdzas bsnams par byin gyis brlab la /
T02D1278:130b-41: mchod yon la dza: h'um bam ho: sv'a h'a /
T02D1278:131a-0: zhabs ba sil la ni ri ti kham @131a * //
T02D1278:131a-2: zhes brjod pas byin gyis brlabs nas tshogs kyi lha spyan drang ba ni /
T02D1278:131a-3: lus kyis rdo rje dril bu gzung nas /
T02D1278:131a-5: khyod ni rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor //
T02D1278:131a-6: rdo rje mi phyed ci bzhed pa //
T02D1278:131a-7: mchog tu dgyes par gshegs nas kyang //
T02D1278:131a-8: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1278:131a-9: zhes brjod la bsam pas snying ga'i padma'i h'um las 'od 'phros pas /
T02D1278:131a-10: 'od kyis bla ma dang kye'i rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs la /
T02D1278:131a-11: de la mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang /
T02D1278:131a-12: gdan rnams phul la mandala gyi steng du bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1278:131a-13: de nas dang po'i bla ma'i smin mtshams su shes
T02D1278:131a-14: pa gtad la bla ma la phyag bya ba dang
T02D1278:131a-16: de nas yid kyis gtso bo'i zhabs la spyi bos
T02D1278:131a-17: gtugs la lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdig pa dag
T02D1278:131a-21: de nas mchod par dbul ba ni /
T02D1278:131a-22: dang po mi'i mchod pa rdzas rim par bshams pa yod na de dbul /
T02D1278:131a-23: med na rang gi snying ga nas phyi'i mchod pa'i lha mo sprul la dbul /
T02D1278:131a-25: chu dang thang las skyes pa yi //
T02D1278:131a-26: lha rdzas bzang po'i me tog 'di //
T02D1278:131a-27: gus pa mchog gis bdag 'bul na //
T02D1278:131a-28: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02D1278:131a-30: lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba yi //
T02D1278:131a-31: lha rdzas bzang po'i bdug spos 'di //
T02D1278:131a-32: gus pas mchog gis bdag 'bul na //
T02D1278:131a-33: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02D1278:131a-35: gdon rnams rab 'joms shis pa yi //
T02D1278:131a-36: dge zhing mun sel mar me 'di //
T02D1278:131a-37: gus pas mchog gis bdag 'bul na //
T02D1278:131a-38: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02D1278:131a-40: nags tshal chu ni yid 'ong ba'i //
T02D1278:131a-41: dri zhim chu yi lha yi chu //
T02D1278:131a-42: gus pas mchog gis bdag 'bul na //
T02D1278:131a-43: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02D1278:131a-45: sman rnams bcud ni yid 'ong ba'i //
T02D1278:131a-46: sngags kyi zhal zas bshos 'di dag / gus pas mchog gis bdag 'bul na //
T02D1278:131a-47: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02D1278:131a-48: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta nee wi dye p'u
T02D1278:131a-49: dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa
T02D1278:131b-0: ma ye h'um zhes pas mchod @131b pa dbul bar
T02D1278:131b-1: bya'o // da ni nang gi mchod pa ni rang gi snying ga nas /
T02D1278:131b-2: lha mo brgyad spros pa ni /
T02D1278:131b-3: goo r'i byang chub sems dkar po thogs pa /
T02D1278:131b-4: tsoo r'i byang chub sems dmar po thogs pa /
T02D1278:131b-5: bet'a l'i dri chu thogs pa /
T02D1278:131b-7: tsandal'i cang te'u brdung ba spros la mchod par bya'o //
T02D1278:131b-8: gsang ba'i mchod pa ni rang gi snying ga nas lha mo dombi n'i spros nas /
T02D1278:131b-9: yum bdag med ma dang gnyis med du bstim la mchod do //
T02D1278:131b-10: de'i dus su ngag tu 'di skad brjod do //
T02D1278:131b-11: goo r'i ma ni ri bong 'dzin /
T02D1278:131b-12: tsoo r'i ma ni nyi ma 'dzin /
T02D1278:131b-13: bee t'a l'i ni rdo rje chu /
T02D1278:131b-16: ri khrod ma ni sbrang tsi 'dzin //
T02D1278:131b-17: gtum mo cang te'u sgra brdung zhing //
T02D1278:131b-18: g-yung mo mgul pa dag la 'khyud //
T02D1278:131b-19: 'dod chags chen po rjes chags pa //
T02D1278:131b-20: skyes bu bzhin du byed par shog / phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum //
T02D1278:131b-21: 'di dag gsum gyis gtso bo mchod //
T02D1278:131b-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra p'u
T02D1278:131b-23: dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa
T02D1278:131b-24: ma ye h'um sv'a h'a h'am /
T02D1278:131b-25: de nas sdig pa bshags pa ni /
T02D1278:131b-26: bdag gi sdig pa bgyis pa dang //
T02D1278:131b-27: rjes su yi rang bgyid stsal gang //
T02D1278:131b-28: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi spyan snga 'dir //
T02D1278:131b-29: thams cad ma lus so sor bshags //
T02D1278:131b-30: sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams dang //
T02D1278:131b-31: 'phags pa rang rgyal nyan thos dang //
T02D1278:131b-32: so so skye bo'i tshogs rnams la //
T02D1278:131b-33: gus pas rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D1278:131b-34: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog / de yis gsungs pa'i dam chos dang //
T02D1278:131b-35: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun la //
T02D1278:131b-36: byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi //
T02D1278:131b-37: bdag gi sbyin pa la sogs pa //
T02D1278:131b-38: pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa //
T02D1278:131b-39: rdo rje theg pa bla med pa'i //
T02D1278:131b-40: lam ni yang dag bsten par bgyi //
T02D1278:131b-41: bdag gi dge ba 'di dag kun //
T02D1278:131b-42: bla med byang chub yang dag rdzogs //
T02D1278:131b-43: sems can kun don phan pa'i phyir //
T02D1278:131b-44: mi gnas mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D1278:131b-45: bdag gi dge ba 'di dag kun //
T02D1278:131b-46: yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas ni //
T02D1278:131b-47: sems can kun dang thun mong du //
T02D1278:131b-48: yongs su smin cing rdzogs par shog / ces brjod la /
T02D1278:132a-1: chub sems dpa' dang dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa la /
T02D1278:132a-3: bdag dus thams cad dang rnam pa thams cad du bzhes su gsol /
T02D1278:132a-4: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis /
T02D1278:132a-5: dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub stsal du gsol /
T02D1278:132a-6: de nas sdom pa bzung nas bstod pa nyi shu pas bstod la /
T02D1278:132a-8: gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas //
T02D1278:132a-10: yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod nas smon lam
T02D1278:132a-11: gdab pa ni rigs su skye zhing dam tshig can
T02D1278:132a-12: // smyo med kyi yi rdo rje ston //
T02D1278:132a-13: bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan //
T02D1278:132a-14: skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog / lag pa rdo rje dril bu 'khrol //
T02D1278:132a-15: zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang //
T02D1278:132a-16: btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can //
T02D1278:132a-17: skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog / de nas gshegs su gsol ba ni //
T02D1278:132a-18: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D1278:132a-19: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D1278:132a-20: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D1278:132a-21: slar yang byan par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1278:132a-22: zhes brjod la he badzra mandala mu: zhes pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
